tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
quoteText:
We reserve the right to determine the form and means of providing notifications to you, and you agree to receive legal notices electronically if that’s what we decide.
We may revise these Terms from time to time and the most current version will always be posted on our website.
If a revision, in our discretion, is material, we’ll notify you.
